div.style: background-image: url('school_management/static/images/s_school.jpeg'); color: grey; background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center;

h1.style: text-align: center; font-size: 62px; font-weight: bold; color: white;

div.p: Unlock your child's potential at F.M.S School. Our commitment to excellence, experienced educators, and vibrant learning spaces create the perfect environment for your child to thrive. Join our family and watch your child's future take flight. Enroll today!
